data.text: Mayɛ mmɔbɔ!
Wɔapra Onyamefɛrefo nyinaa afi asase so.
Nsa abien no nyinaa akokwaw bɔneyɛ mu;
Nea oye wɔ wɔn mu no te sɛ ohwirem;
Nnye obiara nni;
Ɔbabarima twiri nʼagya,
Me de, mede anidaso hwɛ Awurade,
Mma wʼani nnye, me tamfo!
Sɛ mayɛ bɔne atia no nti,
Afei, mʼatamfo behu
Da a wɔbɛto wʼafasu no bɛba,
Da no, nnipa bɛba wo nkyɛn
Asase no bɛyɛ amamfo, esiane nnipa a wɔtete so
Fa wo pema di wo nkurɔfo anim,
“Mɛyɛ anwonwade akyerɛ wo,
Aman behu wo na wɔn ani bewu,
Wobedi dɔte sɛ awɔ,
Hena na ɔte sɛ wo,
Wubehu yɛn mmɔbɔ bio,
Wobɛyɛ ɔnokwafo ama Yakob
